title: Mo'Nique
description:
Kevin talks with comedian, actress, and friend Mo’Nique about saying no to Tyler Perry, Oprah Winfrey, and Lee Daniels, being blackballed in Hollywood, and how the lows and highs of her life have affected her happiness.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds!
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, Mo'Nique)
